name: Heart Attack (itch)
description:
DESCRIPTION
Save your heart from the attacks of junk food!

CONTROLS
- Left click for grabbing.
- Press space for cleaning the screen of enemies when you can.

CREDITS
This is a project made by students for the joy and knowledge about making better games.
- Programmer: Diego C. Torguet. (@DiegoCTorguet)
- Artist: David Aguilera De Casi.
- Logo: Sergio Santos.
- Arrangements: Manuel Rodríguez Matesanz. (@Manuxd789)

We used:
"Pixelland", "Wagon Wheel"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
